ships



	
on

		
sesssion 1

			docker compose up -d; sleep 5; docker exec -it movies_ogv.1 bash
			. /habitat/_controls/build_1.sh
		
		
sesssion 2

			docker exec -it movies_ogv.1 bash
			. /habitat/_controls/build_2.sh
		

	
status

		python3 /habitat/parties/movies_ogv/_status/status.proc.py


	
publishing

		git tag 1.0.0
		(pip install poetry && cd /habitat && rm -rf dist && poetry build --format sdist --verbose && chmod -R 777 /habitat && poetry publish --verbose;)
